bibl.title: Nauplius at Troy: Aeschylus fr. 451k (Radt)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. XX, 2253a (= M.-P.3 30; LDAB 112), lines 1-7. Reanalysis of a fragment of Aeschylus ascribed by Sommerstein to the prologue of Palamedes. It is suggested the fragment comes from the latter part of the play. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.seg: C. Michael Sampson, Nauplius at Troy: Aeschylus fr. 451k (Radt).

P. Oxy. XX, 2253a (= M.-P.3 30; LDAB 112), lines 1-7. Reanalysis of a fragment of Aeschylus ascribed by Sommerstein to the prologue of Palamedes. It is suggested the fragment comes from the latter part of the play. - Avec résumé en anglais.
